text: Art Club Member
Art Club Vice President
Hi there!
Hi there!
Wow... she's really cute...!

Sorry to bother you while you're busy...!
I'm Chiyoko Sonoda, here for an interview.

I'm Juri Saijo. Uh... Excuse me,
could you tell me where the vice president of the art club is?
Motion

Hello!
I heard you're going to draw the cover illustration─

Y-Yes,
that's me...!

Thank you. Well then,
can I start interviewing you right away while we're at it?
Motion
Motion
Oh... every club seems to be working hard.

The track team is──...
Oh, are those the ones over there?

Oh... they have such graceful forms...
It fits perfectly with the theme of the cover, "Start!"

Right!
Thank you for the wonderful idea!

Oh, no...
I just happened to like it... It just came to me.

Is that so? But I understand, it's cool...!
If we could take some photos─
Huh, photos?

Yeah, I thought it might be good
to have some for reference for the cover.

I-I see...
That would be helpful...!

But is it okay...
to disturb your practice...?

Well, we won't know until we ask...
I'll go talk to them myself.
Yes...!
